definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Bone whistles, used as a type of flute, have been found dating back to 5,000 BC.
sentences.chinese: 用作笛子的骨哨早已出现在公元前5，000年。

sentences.english: He paused at the end of each line to pipe skirling notes on his flute.
sentences.chinese: 每唱完一句，他便停下来，用笛子演奏一段乐曲。

sentences.english: From Chenxi County, like to play bamboo flute and cucurbit flute.
sentences.chinese: 来自辰溪县，爱好笛子和葫芦丝演奏。

sentences.english: He piped so that we could dance.
sentences.chinese: 他吹笛子好让我们跳舞。

sentences.english: I mainly blowing saxophones and musical instruments, such as the flute.
sentences.chinese: 我主要是吹萨克斯风和民族乐器，例如笛子。

sentences.english: Miffy's loved music, and she was learning to play the recorder.
sentences.chinese: 米菲好爱音乐，她正在学习如何吹奏笛子。

sentences.english: She puts a bamboo flute before chest and be like to hold the crosier in ancient Egyptian queen hand.
sentences.chinese: 她将笛子放在胸前，就像握着古埃及女王手中的权杖。

sentences.english: Plastic champagne flutes are constructed into a full-height display tower.
sentences.chinese: 塑料香槟笛子是建设成为一个完全高度显示塔。

sentences.english: "kazoo" is a very like a flute toy Musical Instruments.
sentences.chinese: 卡祖”就是一种很像笛子的玩具乐器。

sentences.english: Surreally, a man on a bench is playing the flute.
sentences.chinese: 梦幻一般，一个男子还在那里吹着笛子。

sentences.english: The bamboo Flute is one of the most characteristic musical instruments in China.
sentences.chinese: 笛子是中国最具特色的吹奏乐器之一。

sentences.english: A pipe organ gives much more volume than a violin or flute.
sentences.chinese: 管风琴发出的音量比小提琴或笛子都大。

sentences.english: You can simply switch Dizi and be ready to play another 3 keys.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通过换笛子的方法来转其他的调。

sentences.english: But i wonder were you doing Yoga with Hanfu or fluting ?
sentences.chinese: 但我想问下你是在做瑜珈还是吹笛子呢？

sentences.english: When the Dizi is played, the membrane vibrates with the Dizi, producing a sweet, bright tone.
sentences.chinese: 当笛子演奏音乐时，笛膜震动，就会产生悦耳的声音。

definition: xiao, a Chinese musical instrument of ancient times, similar to panpipes
huqin/family of Chinese two-stringed fiddles, with snakeskin covered wooden soundbox and bamboo bow with horsehair bowstring
ocarina/wind instrument consisting of an egg-shaped chamber with holes
hulusi, aka cucurbit flute (a kind of free reed wind instrument)
bawu, a free reed wind instrument shaped like a flute and played transversally, associated particularly with minority cultures of Yunnan
zither or guzheng/large zither with 13 to 25 strings, developed from guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] during Tang and Song times
